1.name: Electric Drill
1.description: A drill which is driven by an electric motor, commonly used for drilling holes on concrete and wood.

2.name: Angle Grinder
2.description: Also known as a side grinder or disc grinder, is a handheld power tool used for grinding and polishing.

3.name: Tea Cup
3.description: Care to have some tea? In some lands it is custom to raise the last finger on the hand, or 'pinkie' when drinking from a tea cup.

4.name: Wrench
4.description: A tool used to provide grip and mechanical advantage in applying torque to turn objects.

6.name: Paint Brush
6.description: A brush used to apply paint or sometimes ink. A paintbrush is usually made by clamping the bristles to a handle with a ferrule.

7.name: Book
7.description: A book with an orange hard cover. The title reads as 'The Meaning of Life' by Gregory McDuckleberry

8.name: Electronic Parts
8.description: Various electronic components taken out from a computer unit.

9.name: Medicine Capsule
9.description: A miracle medicine that cures all ailments.

10.name: First Aid Kit
10.description: A collection of supplies and equipment that is used to give medical treatment. Restores up to full health.

11.name: Bandage
11.description: Patch up that open wound to avoid exposure and infection. Restores a tiny amount of HP.
